name: FocusFlow
signal_source: ADHD app research shows users 'love this app' and find 'significant improvements in concentration' with adaptive focus tools
description: Adaptive focus sessions that adjust timing and break patterns based on user attention and energy levels
target_user: People with attention challenges who find rigid focus timers don't match their natural attention patterns
pain_point_evidence: Users report traditional focus apps 'don't help users recover from interruptions' and 'it takes ~23 minutes to refocus after being sidetracked'
core_loop: System adjusts timing based on your patterns
Smart break suggestions when attention dips
differentiation: Adaptive timing vs. fixed intervals, pattern learning vs. rigid structure
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced pattern analysis and integration with other productivity tools

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic sessions, premium for adaptive features and analytics
